title: Harlem Mourns the Rev. Calvin Butts III
description: Congregants and neighbors remembered a pastor who they said was determined to fight racism and lift up the Black community.
dc:creator: Corey Kilgannon and Lauren McCarthy
media:credit: Gregg Vigliotti for The New York Times
media:description: The Rev. Calvin O. Butts IIIâ€™s chair was left empty during a Sunday service dedicated to his memory at Abyssinian Baptist Church. His Bible was placed on the seat and his robe draped over the chair.
